title: (x) Need Help Identifying this Simple Font - Garamond Italic {Florian}
content:
I forgot the font I used for this one. It's not quite like Monotype Corsiva as I initially thought.  
Anyone who can help me remember?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100204220518im_/http:/typophile.com/files/for%20your%20money_5636.JPG)
author: xsalt
